title: A Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis of Combination Behavioral Interventions Co-Targeting Psychosocial Syndemics and HIV-Related Health Behaviors for Sexual Minority Men.
purpose: To have a better understanding of the state of interventions co-targeting interrelated syndemic conditions and HIV-related health behaviors of sexual minority men

title: Psychosocial Syndemic Correlates of Sexual Compulsivity Among Men Who Have Sex with Men: A Meta-Analysis.
purpose: (1) Determine which syndemic conditions are significantly associated with sexual compulsivity among MSM ; (2) calculate the mean effect size of these conditions with sexual compulsivity; (3) determine if this effect varies as a function of the type of syndemic condition

title: HIV risk behaviours among immigrant and ethnic minority gay and bisexual men in North America and Europe: A systematic review.
purpose: Examine the HIV prevalence and associated risk behaviours among migrant and ethnic minority MSM in North America and Europe

title: Identifying Resilience Resources for HIV Prevention Among Sexual Minority Men: A Systematic Review.
purpose: Identify a set of resilience ressources among MSM burdened with minority stress and psychosocial conditions which may improve HIV prevention

title: Religion and Spiritualityâ€™s Influences on HIV Syndemics Among MSM: A Systematic Review and Conceptual Model
purpose: Examining the effects of spirituality and religion on MSM's health and proposing a framework for integrating these factors into HIV research with MSM
